pullRequest.title: MINOR: Use JUnit 5 in raft module
pullRequest.bodyText:
I also removed a test class with no tests currently.
Committer Checklist (excluded from commit message)

 Verify design and implementation
 Verify test coverage and CI build status
 Verify documentation (including upgrade notes)

commit.message: MINOR: Use JUnit 5 in raft module

nodes.bodyText: Ouch. Probably meant to come back to this. Filed https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/KAFKA-10519.
